**2/26/13 Patch**
We have released another patch to the game. We have a lot of big fixes:

Major Fixes

* IMPORTANT NOTE: 60Hz sim is now “opt in” not “opt out”. If you have a fast computer and can handle the 60 fps sim, please just turn it on in Brutal Legends Options!
* Fixes to performance/lag on computers with slower CPUs.
* HiFi Sim (i.e. simulate at 60 fps) now off by default. Users can enable it, but may see some jitter until we fix a couple more bugs. 
* Fixes to some options not saving/loading correctly.
* Fix for oceans sometimes not rendering on AMD GPUs.
* Missing cutscene at end of intro bridge plays properly again.
* Mission beacon now appears appropriately throughout game.
* Fixes to some car physics when Hi Fi Sim is on.
